quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Bell and Screech
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, substitute, didnt. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who were the two contestants in the finals during Season 1 of Flavor of love?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hoopz  New York

questions.question: What is the premise of the show Flavor of Love?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dating

questions.question: What did Pumkin do at the end of her elimination night on Flavor of Love?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spit on someone

questions.question: In an episode of Saved by the Bell, Zack comes up with the idea of making up a secret admirer for Screech so that he will concentrate on their science project, but when Screech wants to meet this fantasy girl, Zack must dress up and pretend to be her. What name does he use?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bambi

questions.question: Why did Steve McQueens character catch the men/women that were wanted on the western show Wanted: Dead or Alive?

options.text: He had nothing else to do

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He wanted justice

questions.question: Brigitte Nielsen appeared on the show Flavor of Love.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On the reunion Flavor of Love show Hoopz declares that she intends to marry Flava Flav.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The reality TV show Flavor of Love is a spin off of the Surreal Life, Season 2.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the name of the substitute teacher in Saved by the Bell who takes over for Ms. Simpsons class when she injures her back?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tony Crane

questions.question: When Screech becomes hall monitor in Saved by the Bell, what popular hero did he picture himself as in his daydream?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robocop

questions.question: Kelly from Saved by the Bell needs Screech to tutor her so that she can pass her science test. They become close and she then invites him to go with her to a concert. Whose concert is it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Michael

questions.question: In the Saved by the Bell episode The Gift, Screech is struck by lightning in a freak accident and as a result can see into the future. Zack uses Screechs ability to place bets with Slater, but in the end it all backfires on Zack. What price does he have to pay to Slater?

options.text: He has to give Slater his cellphone.
He must be Slaters slave for a week.
He must give up chasing after Kelly.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He must be Slaters slave for a week.

questions.question: In episode 5 of Flavor of Love, which contestant decided to leave the competition?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Red Oyster

questions.question: When didnt Steve McQueens character wear his gun and gun belt on the show Wanted: Dead or Alive?

options.text: When he gave it to someone else
When he didnt want people to recognize him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: When he didnt want people to recognize him.

questions.question: Who was the first in the group to get their license in the TV series Saved by the Bell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Slater

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bell and Zack
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, jesse, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the popular TV series “Get Smart,” what was Siegfrieds exact position in the organization he was part of?

options.text: Vice President of Public Relations and Terror

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vice President of Public Relations and Terror

questions.question: In saved by the Bell, why does Zack run against Jesse for Class President?

options.text: He wants to be remembered as a good guy.
He wants to go to Washington D.C.
He thinks it will help him get Kelly.
He thinks it will look good on his college applications.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He wants to go to Washington D.C.

questions.question: In Saved by the Bell, when the school held a dating auction for a dance, Zack is bid on by many girls but in the end Lisa buys him for $100.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Barbara (Hall) Feldon portrayed Agent 99, Smart’s love interest in the “Get Smart” series.  She was already famous for at least two reasons with this one being one of them.

options.text: She was a top model for Tiffany jewelry.
She already had won two Emmys for her work on Gunsmoke.
She was a James Bond girl.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She won $64,000 on The $64,000 Question.

questions.question: On the TV show Saved by the Bell, Zack had a cardboard cut out of Kelly in his room. What is she holding in the picture?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Volleyball

questions.question: Actress Barbara Feldon, agent 99 from the “Get Smart” series, had her portrait done by which famous artist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Warhol

questions.question: In the TV series Saved by the Bell, when Johnny Dakota comes to town to shoot the anit-drug commercial, which Bayside babe does he fall for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kelly

questions.question: A reason for Barbara Feldon’s fame before she took the role of agent 99 in “Get Smart” was a  commercial she made on a tigerskin rug from which she touted the greatness of what product?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Top Brass

questions.question: Who did Violet date before she dated Screech in Saved by the Bell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nerdstrom

questions.question: In the episode of Saved by the Bell that focuses on career day, Slater takes a look into his future and has an image of himself coming to a Bayside reunion as an old, overweight wrestler while everyone else has done something successful in their lives. What does he imagine Zack as?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gameshow Host

questions.question: In an episode of Saved by the Bell, Mr. Belding tells Zack he wants him to take his niece out on a date but Zack already had plans and told Screech to dress up like him and take the girl out. What was her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Penny

questions.question: In a Saved by the Bell episode, Zack runs a hot line out of his room for the troubled teens of Bayside. He takes a call from Kelly and her little sister at the same time, mixing up the calls and giving wrong advice to the girls. What is Kellys sisters name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicki

questions.question: In the episode of Saved by the Bell in which Jesse gets addicted to caffeine pills, what test is she studying for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Geometry

questions.question: What is Violets last name in the Saved by the Bell series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bickerstaff

questions.question: At the costume ball in Saved by the Bell, when Kelly has fallen for her boss Jeff, Slater and Jesse are siging this song as Kelly and Zack break up.

options.text: All Im Living for is Gone

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All Im Living for is Gone

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Boss and Sitcom
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, tv, sitcom. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the “Get Smart” show when someone said Rubber baby buggy bumpersbumping before baron Brumswellby bus, what was Maxwells reply?

options.text: Thats easy for you to say!
As if I didnt know that!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thats easy for you to say!

questions.question: On Whos the Boss, Tony accidentally sees Angela naked.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On which comedians popular TV show did Don Adams become a regular?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Perry Comos

questions.question: Don Adams won on Arthur Godfreys Talent Scouts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On the sitcom Whos the Boss, why was Tony forced to retire from the St. Louis Cardinals?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: shoulder injury

questions.question: Who was Mona Robinson on the show Whos the Boss?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Angelas mother

questions.question: Which of these was NOT one of Urkels inventions on Family Matters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A solar powered laptop

questions.question: Name the theme song for Whos the Boss.

options.text: As Long As Weve Got Each Other

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brand New life

questions.question: On the sitcom Family Matters, Urkel was left to live with the Winslows when his parents ran off to this country, leaving him behind.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Russia

questions.question: What type of car does Max drive in the “Get Smart” show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1965 Sunbeam

questions.question: Urkel from Family Matters became so popular that he got his own cereal brand.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of these was NOT characteristic of family Matters character Urkel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pocket Protector

questions.question: On the sitcom Whos the Boss, Tony and Angela were romantically involved.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Don Adams, popular for his role in the Get Smart series, won The Ted Mack Amateur Hour.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who was Bonnie on the TV show Whos the Boss?

options.text: There was no Bonnie on the show.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Samanthas best friend

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Blood and Blood Brothers
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, sermon, shows. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What wound did Pvt. Sturgis have in the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: broken arm

questions.question: The Klingon race in the Star Trek series was named after a police officer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the Star Trek series, Klingons are much more tolerant of cold weather than their human counterparts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of these Klingons founded the Klingon Empire in the Star Trek series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kahless

questions.question: At the beginning of the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers, Col. Potter tells Father Mulcahy that someone will visit the Father in two days. Who does Potter say is coming?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cardinal Reardon

questions.question: What was the original air date of the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: April 6, 1981

questions.question: Father Mulcahy does not give a sermon in the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers, what does Pvt. Sturgis offer so that the doctors can treat Pvt. Lowry, who has a high fever, infection, and internal bleeding?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: his blood

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers, in the midst of all the tumult concerning the impending visit, M*A*S*H 4077 receives two new patients, Pvt. Gary Sturgis and Pvt. Dennis Lowry. Which two actors played these parts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennis Troy and Patrick Swazye

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers, Sturgis receives awful news on the eve Father Mulcahys visitor is expected to come. What does the good Father decide to do?

options.text: Nothing. He stays and talks with Sturgis.
He spends the night in prayer, asking for inspiration.
He goes around camp breaking up poker games and drinking.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nothing. He stays and talks with Sturgis.

questions.question: Klingons have appeared in every incarnation of Star Trek?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Urkel did NOT appear on which of these television shows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Perfect Strangers

questions.question: Who was the guest star on the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Patrick Swayze

questions.question: Why is Father Mulcahy upset about the impending visit in the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers?

options.text: He doesnt have enough time to prepare a sermon.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He doesnt have enough time to prepare a sermon.

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Blood Brothers, why wont the doctors use Pvt. Sturgis blood in a transfusion for his friend Lowry?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sturgis has leukemia.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Hill and Television
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, invention, hill. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This man, who could have been a contender, said, If theres anything unsettling to the stomach its watching actors on television talk about their personal lives.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlon Brando

questions.question: In the early episodes of King of the Hill, Luanne was a promiscuous character. What did she do to change her way of life?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She became a born-again virgin.

questions.question: This man, who appeared in the British film noir The Third man, said, I hate television. I hate it almost as much as I hate peanuts. But I cant stop eating peanuts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Orson Welles

questions.question: Is Arlen a real town in Texas?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Who made this remark: Its difficult to produce a television documentary that is both incisive and probing when every 12 minutes one is interrupted by twelve dancing rabbits singing about toilet paper.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rod Serling

questions.question: Who delivered the following words: All television is  educational television. The question is what is it that it teaches.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicholas Johnson

questions.question: What successful novelist remarked, Television is now so desperately hungry for material that theyre scraping the top of the barrel.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gore Vidal

questions.question: Who do these words belong to: Television is  an invention that permits you to be entertained by people you wouldnt have in your home.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Frost

questions.question: Who does the voice of Rev. Karen Stroup on King of the Hill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mary Tyler Moore

questions.question: What is Peggy Hills maiden name on King of the Hill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Platter

questions.question: All television is  childrens television. are words uttered by this man.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard P. Adler

questions.question: What is the name of Bobbys school on the show King of the Hill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Landry Middle School

questions.question: Who provides the voice of Lucky, a recurring character on King of the Hill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Petty

questions.question: Who is Lenore on King of the Hill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bills ex-wife

questions.question: What is the Hills address on the animated show King of the Hill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 84 Rainey Street, Arlen, Texas

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Television and Production
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cartoon, technique. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of the following is not a production of Walt Disney?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Popeye the Sailor

questions.question: This writer from Florida stated, Another possible source of guidance for teenagers is television, but televisions message has always been that the need for truth, wisdom, and  world peace pales in comparison to the need for toothpaste that offers white teeth and fresher breath.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dave Barry

questions.question: Which was Pixars first short animated film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luxo Jr.

questions.question: Japanese animation is referred to as what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anime

questions.question: The executive producer of the PBS show The Electric Company also came up with the concept of this show. It ran from 1980-1988 and featured The Bloodhound Gang.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3-2-1 Contact

questions.question: In 1981 this daily tabloid show debuted on CBS. Nancy ODell and Mark Steines are among the shows hosts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Entertainment Tonight

questions.question: Who performed the voice of Roger in the film Who Framed Roger Rabbit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charles Fleischer

questions.question: Which was the first feature-length animated movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Snow White

questions.question: Tom  Jerry is a production of this company.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: MGM (Metro Goldwyn Mayer)

questions.question: Which was the first cartoon with a fully synchronized soundtrack?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steamboat Willie

questions.question: Onion skinning is closely related to animation.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Stop-motion is an animation technique which uses these.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Real static objects

questions.question: Which of these stop-motion features was not made with film cameras?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Corpse Bride

questions.question: This American music video show debuted in 1983 and had its roots in a show called The Midnight Special.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Friday Night Videos

questions.question: Who said, When television is  good, nothing is better. When television is bad, nothing is worse. I invite you to sit down in front of your TV set and keep your eyes glued to that set until the station signs off. I can assure you that you will observe a vast wasteland.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Newton Minow
